ModMetaData.name: RimDrugs
ModMetaData.author: SpaceCoder
ModMetaData.description:
Description ---------------------------- A mod that Adds Drugs to Rimworld.
Drugs ---------------------------- Drugs that colonists can create in game. - RimPowder
Research ---------------------------- Research that can be done by colonists in game. - Drug Cultivating - Drug Manufacturing
Version ---------------------------- Alpha V0.1
Credits ---------------------------- Creator - TheSpaceCoder Special thanks to all the people who tested the mod
